Ingredients.1: 1 pound fresh strawberries, hulled and cut into chunks

Ingredients.3: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

Ingredients.4: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle light beer

Ingredients.5: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate, thawed

Ingredients.7: 1 teaspoon kosher salt for rimming glasses

Directions.1: Put strawberry chunks in a bowl. Pour tequila over strawberries. Marinate in refrigerator for 2 hours.

Directions.2: Blend strawberries and tequila in a blender until fully pureed; strain into a large pitcher to remove seeds.

Directions.3: Stir strained berry mixture, soda, beer, and limeade concentrate together in a pitcher. Add ice cubes to chill. Rim glasses with salt before pouring margaritas.
